original_text:
Jimi Hendrix
La storia del rock

Lunedì 19 agosto, Woodstock. Alle nove di mattina, di fronte a una folla oceanica, sale sul palco Jimi Hendrix con la sua inseparabile Stratocaster, dando vita a un concerto memorabile rimasto nella storia delle esibizioni live. Un anno dopo morirà in una casa di Londra dopo aver ingerito grosse quantità di alcool e tranquillanti.
Chitarrista dallo stile iconico, in questa slot si respira tutta l’aria degli anni Sessanta e quel vento di libertà e rivoluzione che animava il cuore di milioni di giovani statunitensi.
In un paesaggio desertico che ci fa pensare subito a Woodstock, si trova la nostra griglia di gioco, che ricorda vagamente nella forma la cassa della Fender Stratocaster, la preferita da Jimi. Simboli tematici riportano alla mente il periodo del Peace and Love, come i fiori, il simbolo della pace, il vinile.
La colonna sonora è un mix di hits, a partire dalla famosissima e iconica Voodoo Child.
Una slot dallo stile classico
La NetEnt ha scelto una griglia classica con 5 rulli e 3 righe, su cui sono disposte 20 linee di pagamenti fisse. Operando sui livelli delle puntate e sul costo dei gettoni, si possono creare scommesse personalizzate. Con la più bassa – livello 1 e costo del gettone fissato a 0,01 per linea di pagamento – un singolo Spin costerà appena 0,20 €.
Il tasto Max Bet ci permette di impostare il livello 10 con un solo click, con il pulsante Gioco Automatico possiamo invece dare avvio all’Autoplay.
La volatilità è media e il valore RTP è del 96,9%.
Tutta la magia dei Sessanta
In Jimi Hendrix troviamo diversi tipi di simboli: basso, medio, alto livello e speciali. Si va dalle carte da gioco all’occhio, il fiore, il vinile, il cuore e il simbolo della pace. Per avere vincite più alte bisogna però puntare sulle due Stratocaster e sul volto di Jimi, che è anche il Wild e sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto gli Scatter.
Ci sono due funzioni speciali:
– Purple Haze che trasforma i simboli di basso livello in Wild.
– Re-Spin Red Guitar che offre uno Spin gratis
Lo Scatter è Jimi Hendrix con in mano la Fender. Tre di questi regalano uno dei Bonus Pick and Click a disposizione:
– Gettoni: vincita random compresa tra 8x e 30x la scommessa
– Free Spins Crosstown Traffic: si vincono sei Free Spins con Wild camminanti che si spostano di rullo a ogni giro.
– Free Spins Purple Haze: si ricevono da 6 a 12 Free Spins durante i quali i simboli di basso livello vengono trasformati in Wild.
– Free Spins Little Wing: da 6 a 12 Free Spins e Wild sovrapposti sui rulli in modo casuale.

Domande Frequenti 
Quanti Bonus ci sono in Jimi Hendrix?

In tutto si possono vincere sei funzioni speciali



A quanto ammonta il ritorno teorico al giocatore?

Il valore RTP è del 96,9%



Posso giocare a Jimi Hendrix anche sul tablet?

Certo, questa slot è creata per funzionare su tutti i dispositivi

raw_translation.response:
Jimi Hendrix
The history of rock

On Monday, August 19th, at nine in the morning, Jimi Hendrix took to the stage at Woodstock in front of an oceanic crowd. With his trusty Stratocaster by his side, he put on a memorable concert that would go down in live performance history. A year later, he would die in a London home after ingesting large amounts of alcohol and tranquilizers. 

With his iconic guitar style, this slot game captures the spirit of the 60s and the sense of freedom and revolution that animated the hearts of millions of young Americans. Set against a desert backdrop that immediately brings to mind Woodstock, the game grid vaguely resembles the body of a Fender Stratocaster, Jimi's favorite guitar. Thematic symbols harken back to the era of peace and love, such as flowers, the peace symbol, and vinyl records. The soundtrack is a mix of hits, beginning with the famous and iconic Voodoo Child.

A classic style slot game
NetEnt has chosen a classic grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, on which 20 fixed pay lines are arranged. By adjusting the bet levels and coin costs, you can create personalized bets. With the lowest level - level 1 and a fixed coin cost of 0.01 per pay line - a single spin costs only €0.20.

The Max Bet button allows you to set level 10 with just one click, and the Autoplay button allows you to automatically start the game. The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.9%.

All the magic of the 60s
In Jimi Hendrix, you'll find different types of symbols: low, medium, high level, and special symbols. From playing cards to the eye, the flower, the vinyl, the heart, and the peace symbol. To win higher payouts, however, you'll need to bet on the two Stratocasters and Jimi's face, which also serves as the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter.

There are two special features:

- Purple Haze, which turns low-level symbols into Wild symbols.
- Re-Spin Red Guitar, which offers a free spin.

The Scatter is Jimi Hendrix holding the Fender. Three of these symbols trigger one of the available Bonus Pick and Click features:

- Coins: a random win between 8x and 30x the bet.
- Free Spins Crosstown Traffic: win six free spins with walking Wild symbols that move on each turn.
- Free Spins Purple Haze: receive six to 12 free spins during which low-level symbols are transformed into Wild symbols.
- Free Spins Little Wing: gain six to 12 free spins with randomly overlapping Wild symbols on the reels.

Frequently Asked Questions
How many bonuses are in Jimi Hendrix?

A total of six special features can be won.

What is the theoretical return to player?

The RTP value is 96.9%.

Can I play Jimi Hendrix on my tablet?

Certainly, this slot is designed to work on all devices.

On Monday, August 19th, at nine in the morning, Jimi Hendrix took to the stage at Woodstock in front of an oceanic crowd. With his trusty Stratocaster by his side, he put on a memorable concert that would go down in live performance history. A year later, he would die in a London home after ingesting large amounts of alcohol and tranquilizers. 

With his iconic guitar style, this slot game captures the spirit of the 60s and the sense of freedom and revolution that animated the hearts of millions of young Americans. Set against a desert backdrop that immediately brings to mind Woodstock, the game grid vaguely resembles the body of a Fender Stratocaster, Jimi's favorite guitar. Thematic symbols harken back to the era of peace and love, such as flowers, the peace symbol, and vinyl records. The soundtrack is a mix of hits, beginning with the famous and iconic Voodoo Child.

A classic style slot game
NetEnt has chosen a classic grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, on which 20 fixed pay lines are arranged. By adjusting the bet levels and coin costs, you can create personalized bets. With the lowest level - level 1 and a fixed coin cost of 0.01 per pay line - a single spin costs only €0.20.

The Max Bet button allows you to set level 10 with just one click, and the Autoplay button allows you to automatically start the game. The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.9%.

All the magic of the 60s
In Jimi Hendrix, you'll find different types of symbols: low, medium, high level, and special symbols. From playing cards to the eye, the flower, the vinyl, the heart, and the peace symbol. To win higher payouts, however, you'll need to bet on the two Stratocasters and Jimi's face, which also serves as the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter.

There are two special features:

- Purple Haze, which turns low-level symbols into Wild symbols.
- Re-Spin Red Guitar, which offers a free spin.

The Scatter is Jimi Hendrix holding the Fender. Three of these symbols trigger one of the available Bonus Pick and Click features:

- Coins: a random win between 8x and 30x the bet.
- Free Spins Crosstown Traffic: win six free spins with walking Wild symbols that move on each turn.
- Free Spins Purple Haze: receive six to 12 free spins during which low-level symbols are transformed into Wild symbols.
- Free Spins Little Wing: gain six to 12 free spins with randomly overlapping Wild symbols on the reels.

A total of six special features can be won.

The RTP value is 96.9%.

Review:
 
Game Design and Theme

Jimi Hendrix is an online slot game from NetEnt that captures the spirit of the 60s and the sense of freedom and revolution that animated the hearts of millions of young Americans. Set against a desert backdrop that immediately brings to mind Woodstock, the game grid vaguely resembles the body of a Fender Stratocaster, Jimi's favorite guitar. Thematic symbols harken back to the era of peace and love, such as flowers, the peace symbol, and vinyl records. The soundtrack is a mix of hits, beginning with the famous and iconic Voodoo Child.

Reel Grid and Pay Lines

Jimi Hendrix has a classic grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, on which 20 fixed pay lines are arranged. By adjusting the bet levels and coin costs, players can create personalized bets. The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.9%. The minimum bet per spin is €0.20 and the maximum bet is €200.

Special Features

Jimi Hendrix features various types of symbols, including low, medium, and high level symbols, as well as special symbols. The Wild symbol is Jimi's face, which replaces all symbols except the Scatter. There are two special features available in the game: Purple Haze, which turns low-level symbols into Wild symbols, and Re-Spin Red Guitar, which offers a free spin. 

Bonus Features

Jimi Hendrix offers four bonus features, which are triggered by three Scatter symbols. The bonus features include Coins, Free Spins Crosstown Traffic, Free Spins Purple Haze, and Free Spins Little Wing. During the Coins feature, players win a random prize between 8x and 30x the bet. During the Free Spins Crosstown Traffic feature, players win six free spins with walking Wild symbols that move on each turn. During the Free Spins Purple Haze feature, players receive six to 12 free spins during which low-level symbols are transformed into Wild symbols. And during the Free Spins Little Wing feature, players gain six to 12 free spins with randomly overlapping Wild symbols on the reels.

Compatibility with Devices

Jimi Hendrix is designed to work on all devices, including desktop computers, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. The game can be played on iOS and Android devices, as well as on Windows, Linux, and Mac operating systems.

Review: Jimi Hendrix
The history of rock

On Monday, August 19th, at nine in the morning, Jimi Hendrix took to the stage at Woodstock in front of an oceanic crowd. With his trusty Stratocaster by his side, he put on a memorable concert that would go down in live performance history. A year later, he would die in a London home after ingesting large amounts of alcohol and tranquilizers. 

With his iconic guitar style, this slot game captures the spirit of the 60s and the sense of freedom and revolution that animated the hearts of millions of young Americans. Set against a desert backdrop that immediately brings to mind Woodstock, the game grid vaguely resembles the body of a Fender Stratocaster, Jimi's favorite guitar. Thematic symbols harken back to the era of peace and love, such as flowers, the peace symbol, and vinyl records. The soundtrack is a mix of hits, beginning with the famous and iconic Voodoo Child.

A classic style slot game
NetEnt has chosen a classic grid with 5 reels and 3 rows, on which 20 fixed pay lines are arranged. By adjusting the bet levels and coin costs, you can create personalized bets. With the lowest level - level 1 and a fixed coin cost of 0.01 per pay line - a single spin costs only €0.20.

The Max Bet button allows you to set level 10 with just one click, and the Autoplay button allows you to automatically start the game. The volatility is medium and the RTP value is 96.9%.

All the magic of the 60s
In Jimi Hendrix, you'll find different types of symbols: low, medium, high level, and special symbols. From playing cards to the eye, the flower, the vinyl, the heart, and the peace symbol. To win higher payouts, however, you'll need to bet on the two Stratocasters and Jimi's face, which also serves as the Wild and replaces all symbols except the Scatter.

There are two special features:

- Purple Haze, which turns low-level symbols into Wild symbols.
- Re-Spin Red Guitar, which offers a free spin.

The Scatter is Jimi Hendrix holding the Fender. Three of these symbols trigger one of the available Bonus Pick and Click features:

- Coins: a random win between 8x and 30x the bet.
- Free Spins Crosstown Traffic: win six free spins with walking Wild symbols that move on each turn.
- Free Spins Purple Haze: receive six to 12 free spins during which low-level symbols are transformed into Wild symbols.
- Free Spins Little Wing: gain six to 12 free spins with randomly overlapping Wild symbols on the reels.
